title: Sum of Two Numbers
description:
Write a function that takes two numbers as arguments and returns their sum.

You may assume the inputs are always valid numbers (integer or float). No need to validate inputs.

title: Find the Smallest Number
description:
Given an array of numbers, return the smallest number in the array.

You may assume the array contains at least one number and all elements are valid numbers.

examples.explanation: 1 is the smallest number in the array
-10 is the smallest number in the array
The array contains only one number

title: Countttt Vowels in a String
description:
Write a function that takes a string and returns the count of vowels (a, e, i, o, u) in the string.

The function should be case-insensitive and should only consider English vowels.

examples.explanation: There are no vowels in the string
